title: ADIFF 2015: Dennis Rodman's Big Bang in Pyongyang
desc: (NY PREMIERE)?Documentary chronicling flamboyant celebrity and former NBA basketballer Dennis Rodman's friendship with leader Kim Jong-un that sends him on a controversial mission to improve relations between North Korea and the US by staging a historic basketball game between the two countries. Despite nuclear threats, dissent and Rodman's personal struggles to keep it together, the game must go on. Directed by Colin Offland, UK, 2015, 92min, documentaries in English.
